website_summaries.verdict: This delicious, tropical scented tanning oil is formulated with exotic moisturizing ingredients that will pamper and smooth skin while giving off the classic coconut scent.
pros: Contains cocoa butter, aloe vera, and exotic island botanicals
Will give you a deep, dark tan
We love the classic coconut smell
cons: Does not contain any sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn

customer_reviews.title: The smell...
customer_reviews.text: If you close your eyes while you’re laying outside after applying this, you will Astro project to Hawaii and end up surfing and eating pineapples .
customer_reviews.author: Dhurley405

customer_reviews.title: BEST OIL EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tanning oil. It's by far the best I've ever bought! Especially for the price. As you can tell in my pictures, it worked! This is 20 minutes of laying out and it's also very cloudy out! P.s., I bought my bathing suit on cupshe.com. I'm sorry if the picture of myself is too revealing, I didnt mean for it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kyley Flippo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Gave me a natural, deep, tan quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for a few weeks now and absolutely love the way it has left my legs. It also smells amazing and keeps you looking super moisturized at all times. I get so many compliments on my natural tan :) Would so purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Great Tan
customer_reviews.text: Have used thus product since the 70s. Will give you a deep, dark tan and make your skin feeling soft. But do know this product has ZERO sun blocker.
customer_reviews.author: DDDD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tanning oil!
customer_reviews.text: I'm Scottish and It helped me achieve a nice tan. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who thinks they can't get a tan.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Spent an hour or so out in the sun for a couple days & this stuff really darkened my base tan nicely. 4 stars instead of 5 due to personal preferences: I don't personally enjoy the scent & as others have stated you are left with a greasy feeling.I use it sparingly & still feel slimy, but it is an oil after all. I also have ridiculously sensitive skin ( breakout city with a lot of various products) although it's oil i've had no skin irritation whatsoever. Overall a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynne martin

customer_reviews.title: I went from being whiter than a glass of milk ...
customer_reviews.text: I went from being whiter than a glass of milk, to being as dark as a cardboard box in the span of a week while using this stuff, all just by slathering it on and then doing menial yard work.
customer_reviews.author: T Patistas

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I always get my best, long lasting tan using this oil; however, I just realized you do NOT need to use it in a tanning bed because it contains mineral oil. Mineral oil greatly damages tanning beds and can be very expensive to repair. I got my darkest tan with this product when I laid out in the sun for about 1-2 hours. It is MARVELOUS! And don’t even get me started on the smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiara R.

customer_reviews.title: Used for 5 days and no difference
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly. Opened up the packaging and it was very well wrapped and sealed in bubble wrap. The smell is quite strong so I’m not a Huge fan of that. Tanning oil takes some getting used to as it does not rub in quite like lotion. Oil essentially just lays on the skin. I have been using it for about 5 days and have seen no real difference in skin complexion so I’m not able to speak on if it works or not. I’m not thinking it does much for the pale complexion
customer_reviews.author: Mark Reuger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tanning oil !!!!!! Hard to find anymore!!!!!!!! !
customer_reviews.text: I love this tanning oil. I'm allergic to the sun. This is the only tanning oil that stops the little blister like bumps from coming out. I've had the other two bottles for a few years. A little goes along way . I went to buy more and couldnt find it anywhere . Found different kinds of Hawaiian tanning oil. But not this exact one . I ordered 2 bottles . May order more . Just so grateful Amazon had it. It makes the summer so much better. Thank you Amazon for having this hard to find wonderful tanning oil.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This product was not the best. Keep in mind I’m a mixed girl, but pretty white skin tone. I honestly didn’t feel like it did anything for me. I tan pretty easy, and I would’ve thought that this would help even more but the places where I applied very little/none got more sun! Super fair skin tones try it out, but definitely my mixed girls and darker this ain’t it ladies. And trust me, I love to be tan lol
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: In 2020 they can’t figure out how to put a cap that done leak.
customer_reviews.text: For 30 years this caps been the same leaking mess. It’s unbelievable how they don’t come up with a new cap. Oh I know why they want bottle to leak so you buy more. Hustlers. Other than that this is my go to oil
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Watered down cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t seem to work at all. I used this to try and tan almost for a whole summer. It literally just feels like watered down oil. Leaves the skin greasy and never soaks in. Doesn’t moisturize well and also does not help with getting tan!! Cheap Walmart indoor tanning lotion even works better. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Calina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Rancid. Do not buy from here
customer_reviews.text: I’ve literally been using this my entire life, so I know the correct smell and such. This was rancid and expired. Huge disappointment for me :( Buy from a brick and mortar if you can find one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tanning oil that works
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t believe tanning oil worked but I saw some serious results! I got so tan my first day using this and I definitely would not have gotten that tan normally. I’m in love, and it doesn’t make you feel gross and oily as long as you don’t put too much on.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Overall Top-Notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best money ever spent on a tanning product: not greasy, smooths on so well, soaked into my skin and left me feeling like a sun-kissed tanned goddess. Most importantly, I looked like a sun-kissed goddess after an hour or two in variable sunlight. I’d been worried about burning but this product seems to stave off the burn long enough for me to tan.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Definitely purchase if youre looking to smell amazing and get darker while doing it. I like the oil feel and smell, so that could just be me, but I buy this stuff all the time and Im extremely picky about things for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It is so luxurious. I use it as a moisturizer skin lotion after a shower also. Use just a little while your still wet after a shower. Skin loves it. I tan easy but this helps make my tan richer looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should not be sending smashed products. Lost half the oil
customer_reviews.text: The tanning oil was smashed up on both sides. When I opened it it went everywhere all over my bathroom. Not impressed. The box was not smashed at all. The oil was smashed before it was ever put into the Amazon box
customer_reviews.author: Lanae Ricken

customer_reviews.title: You will get tan with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in the 80's and this is what we used. I love the stuff, smells like coconuts and reminds me of Spring Break. What's wrong with that? Hardly any UV protection so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: wayne sanders

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil for your skin & HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my hair & also my skin since I'm Native American. The oil is great for your hair & skin.I have used this for 40 years. I am Native American.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Salt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Works real well in tanning bed - it is a little oily so just bring an old towel to wipe yourself off with - nice color
customer_reviews.author: BOB - MEQUON,WI

customer_reviews.title: Deep tanning oil
customer_reviews.text: Been using forever, not for the fair skinned. Should already have a decent tan started before applying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: For me, the smell I remember
customer_reviews.text: Obviously there have been a lot of different products like this over the year, but this one looks and smells exactly like the one I remember throughout the 90s.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality, good scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product. Not the beat that money can buy, but it’s certainly not useless! I didn’t notice any augmentation to my tanning experience, but it does keep your skin from getting dry and has a pleasant smell to it!
customer_reviews.author: Tomm Venable

customer_reviews.title: If you have a tan and you’re looking for a darker tan
customer_reviews.text: If you already have a tan and are looking to darken your tan this is the product to use. This is not a product to use if you’ve not yet begun to develop a tan
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer. Bar none.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best skin moisturizer of all time. I get compliments all of the time on how soft my arms and hands are, and I swear by this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE VACATION
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would remind me of my time in Hawaii while I was at home in my backyard, this does exactly that and it feels really nice on my skin! Seems to do the tanning job well also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Expert

customer_reviews.title: Best oil I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: To all the negative reviewers claiming this caused you to burn. Duh. That’s what is supposed to do. It’s an accelerator. That means it tans you faster. Don’t blame the product for your misuse. I’ve used this twice, for 10 minute indoor sessions and I already have an awesome start to my tan.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love the Dark Tan
customer_reviews.text: I love this tanning oil because it soaks into your skin leaving it super soft and I can still see the glow without being greasy later. I like the bronze and think it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Very good smelling oil just like it was back in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good smelling oil just like it was back in the day! Just wish it came sealed but otherwise very good! P.S. not a sunblock but good oil for the skin and I use it for a vehicle air freshener by putting it on a sponge in a small jar with holes in the lid. Recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Growing up in the '60s, I have always loved this oil. It smells great and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Brode

customer_reviews.title: Tropical scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The smell is incredible and leaves your skin feeling silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the SUN!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My old lady was so darn. happy l found this suntan oil. Was becoming hard to come by. Price was way better then any store and delivered just as quick s going to there.
customer_reviews.author: william mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: It's Hawaian 'Tropic, is there something else to say?
customer_reviews.text: None necessary!!! I have been using the same product for over 30 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Capi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I just have always loved the tanning oil, the smell is great and works great for me when in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Crystal StPierre

customer_reviews.title: Helps you tan fast
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used this product on our vacation and it helped us out tremendously. There is no SPF in this so be aware that you need to use sunscreen in addition to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Y

customer_reviews.title: Works well but it leaves skin oily
customer_reviews.text: Very oily. Washes off with a wash cloth. Happy with tanning results.
customer_reviews.author: steven m voelker

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this, works like a charm. Easy to apply without staining anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Best Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best one I’ve used!! Obtain darkker tan than bronzing items!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tanning oil at a low price. This is usually at least $10 in store.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Have The Smell Of The Original Product That I Remember
customer_reviews.text: Still good for dry skin, but the great smell is diminished.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Super oily
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel it helped with attaining any color. And its extremely oily. More so than other stuff I have used. You def need to take a shower after use or it will leave oil stains on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tan
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product so much! It gives my skin a very pretty tan.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Can’t help because I got an expired old one.
customer_reviews.text: I think I got one that was expired or old. There’s a date at the top that says 2014. We used it at the beach twice and couldn’t tell a difference at all either. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves this, so far she hasn’t said anything bad about it.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves this, so far she hasn’t said anything bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Everyone compliments my tan! 😎
customer_reviews.text: My tan is never been better since I started usi g it!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Andrés Mahecha Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: You will get tan with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Frist time using it and I got a pretty nice start to a good tan. You will turn a little red, but your tanning you skin got to expect it. Will recommend having a base to start on.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious, works well, and great price! I would just advice having a little base tan before using to avoid easily burning.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lynne Voss

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanning Lotion Ever!!️
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning lotion. Period; have used it for 30 years
customer_reviews.author: Larry C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This tanning oil provides an excellent dark tan for your skin. I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Subtle, yummy scent
customer_reviews.text: One my all time favorites. I’ve been using this brand forever and love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Shanlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Tanning Oil!
customer_reviews.text: This will keep you moisturized for hours and help you get a darker fuller tan than ever before.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Fields

customer_reviews.title: Just love this! Thank you for having this available
customer_reviews.text: Brings me right back to my childhood. Just love this! Thank you for having this available! It is not here in local stores!
customer_reviews.author: Steffy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to get a base tan really quick before ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a base tan really quick before a beach trip so I wouldn't fry. This really helped me get it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Get this for a dark tan!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I get so dark with this stuff. Have been using it for years and I love it. Makes your skin really soft afterwards too!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of all times. Get tanned so fast with it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not only gives you a great tan but makes you smell and look fantastic next to the pool. I love this! Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: BEST SMELLING TAN OIL EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a smell I love to dab on just to feel like I'm in Hawaii! The best smelling tan oil EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Deep dark tan
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! Been using it for years. Highly recommend. Just be careful of sunburn. Can happen fast. Amazon... Remove Pedro's racist and derogatory review! It is offensive and no help whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L Hauver

customer_reviews.title: Tanning Goodness
customer_reviews.text: I leather myself with this before and at the beach and the oil does it job. Leaving me tanned and feeling good.
customer_reviews.author: Lissi25

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it still smelled the way it used to more fruity but it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetmstry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Smells devine!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite same as I used over 40 years ago but, hey! What is? My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: I expected a full 8 ounces, it was short.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given a 5 if I would have been sent a full bottle. Hope you can see in the photo how it’s not full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I purchased and it still not working like it said, does not shave as close as it support to. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: great for tanning
customer_reviews.text: im a naturally pale person but this stuff works! 30 minutes in the sun (with proper spf sunscreen under oil) and i have a nice glow! my girlfriend noticed results right away
customer_reviews.author: SD surfer

customer_reviews.title: BEST stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this oil for YEARS! It is my all time favorite
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: I love this feels great
customer_reviews.text: Makes my tan nice and brown, plus it feels good on my skin, 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my trip
customer_reviews.text: Just what I grew up watching my older cousins use. Perfect for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best tan ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has no Sun screen which is what I was looking for it is absolutely perfect for a deep golden tan!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Love this Love this
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product immensely! I have always been a fan of this product and Amazon brought it right to my door
customer_reviews.author: Marley Whittle

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: very oily you will need to shower right after without touching everything but still very worth it because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail tanning oil!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tanning oil. Love the scent and very moisturizing! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JSE Family

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning oil. Love the smell, reminds me of the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best suntan oil ever!
customer_reviews.text: My body is like a bronze goddess using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Treasures

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very mild, and it does keep your skin moisturized for long periods of time at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: So shoot me!
customer_reviews.text: Can't resist the smell of Hawaiian Tropic for the beach in the summer! I would buy this even if I did not use it for the smell! Actually it helps your skin stay moisturized! So there, I made an excuse to use a #8 SPF ;)
customer_reviews.author: Va Breezy1

customer_reviews.title: review on tan oil
customer_reviews.text: great for those darker skin people who don't want sun screen blocking the rays
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No cap on the lid and taped off
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered with no cap on the lid. It was broken off and they tried to tape it. The oil was everywhere and ruined other products in the shipment!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: dark tan with mositurizing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product for several year. If I stay out to long in the sun with this and get a burn I never seem to peel like I do if I get a burn without it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to Oil
customer_reviews.text: Could no longer find locally so we sourced these on Amazon. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't smell as good
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product no longer has the great Hawaiian Tropic smell I love. It smells like chemicals. It is also very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Manhattanite

customer_reviews.title: Tan DADDY
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this wonderful product I am in fact a tan daddy now!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: WARNING IT DOES NOT HAVE SPF
customer_reviews.text: I learned the hard way. It will get you burnt. It cooked my skin when i went to barbados.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels great
customer_reviews.text: The scent was the only flaw. It doesn’t smell very tropical and doesn’t last long. I have been using it after showering and it leaves my skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Have always used this and love it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 20 years and I still love it just as much now as ever. It is still excellent quality and exactly the same as always. The scent is fantastic and smells like a tropical beach to me. I use it as a body moisturizer all summer long and also along with sunscreen out in the sun, as this product doesn't contain sunscreen. I love it, hope they never stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this oil got me so soo tan during our weekend at the river. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good and moisturizes the skin well
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 4 stars because I'm not sure if this product always comes unsealed. I have used this product a long time ago but am not sure if it came sealed back then. This works well with sunscreen underneath if you want spf. It smells so good and moisturizes the skin well.
customer_reviews.author: Minna C.

customer_reviews.title: TAN TAN TAN
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on how tan I am!! Love this product to much.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Been using for over 30 years.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my skin soft and moisturized all year round after my gym workout and shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Q Fink

customer_reviews.title: Tanning
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of softness and the scent. Gives great tan
customer_reviews.author: anna chowsukhum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite smell in the world!!! It has no SPF, so be CAREFUL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronica H.

customer_reviews.title: Good use
customer_reviews.text: I used this befor and I love the tan it gives and need smoothness . tan last a lone time .
customer_reviews.author: Edward Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Only available on amazon all year around. Price same asstore
customer_reviews.author: Sioux2462

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Tan lasted very long and was very dark with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Smells really GREAT
customer_reviews.text: OMG the smell is heavenly , tried it twice so far and it gave me a little nice and shine color can't get enough of the smell I kept smell my arms and hands !
customer_reviews.author: Nawara

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else compares
customer_reviews.text: Love thus product and have used it for years. Brings my skin tone to the perfect color, bronze and beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Hawaiian Tropic
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for the amazing product leaves is rich and dark tan
customer_reviews.author: thomas jablonski

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell coconut. It kept my skin soft also

customer_reviews.title: Yas
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great and I got the most amazing tan

product_meta.title: Hawaiian Tropic Dark Tanning Oil Original 8 oz
product_meta.description: Hawaiian Tropic Tropic Tropic dark tanning oil, original, tanning oil drenches your skin with moisture. Our formula pampers and soothes skin, while its scent sends you directly to the tropics.
feature_bullets: Reef safe Sunscreen, made without oxybenzone and octinoxate
A rare blend of nature's rich tanning oils
Antioxidant vitamins a, c and e
